titleStmt.title: Good newes from the north, truly relating how about a hundred of the Scottish rebels, intending to plunder the house of M. Thomas Pudsie ... were set upon by a troupe of our hoursemen, under the conduct of that truly valorous gentleman Leiutenant [sic] Smith, leiutenant [sic] to noble Sr. Iohn Digby ...
titleStmt.author: M. P. (Martin Parker), d. 1656?

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
